summary: 1999 CHEVROLET SILVERADO. ABS MOTOR RUNS CONTINUOUS EVEN AFTER SHUTTING OFF THE TRUCK. REMOVED FUSE TO SHUT DOWN THE SYSTEM. I AM TOLD BY DEALERSHIP, NOT UNDER WARRANTY OR RECALL. REPAIR PART ALONE WILL COST OVER $800. I DON'T THINK THIS TYPE OF SAFETY EQUIPMENT SHOULD FAIL AT 49,000 MILES. I DON'T HAVE THE MONEY FOR REPAIRS. THIS UNFORESEEN FAILURE DECREASES THE SAFETY AND THE VALUE OF MY INVESTMENT.   *NLM
